answers.answer: Those ultrasounds can be off by a couple pounds.My answer would be no. Maybe he can fit into newborn for a couple weeks.
I'm sure he will be fine momma some newborn fits 5-8 lbs so don't worry too much about preemie outfits :) hope all goes well tonight  good luck!
Thank you!! And I'm just asking so I know if I should pack a few preemie onsies or not . lol
I was 36 weeks and my first baby was also induced due to preeclampsia also. My son had to wear premee and he was 6lb 14oz.
If you have some already take them just in case but if not don't worry about buying them most babies will only wear newborn for about 2-3 weeks anyway newborn will fit just  right :)
Okay thank you ladies! This time tomorrow I'll be a mommy!! Lol I'll keep you all updated!

question: So I'm getting induced tongight I'm 37 weeks and im getting induced due to preeclampsia. And I am wondering if my baby will be small enough to wear preemie clothes for a few days. He weighed 5pounds 9 ounces as of last Thursday so its been a week. Any advice?
title: already mommas help!!
